task.title: Viewing channel aggregates
task.shortdesc: You can expand the view of a path to see the percentage of all customers who completed actions across all of the mini-paths within the channel.

step.cmd: In the path results, right-click on the Actions menu icon for a path.
In the Actions menu, select Expanded view.
Click on the icon for a channel to view the mini-path for that channel.
Select the Aggregates option at the top of the view display.
